p.n: Sam Churchill: Search For A Homeless Man
p.k: Thriller about an ex-surfer turned detective (The Dukes Of Hazzard's John Schneider) who tracks a hostage held by a dangerous gang
69% After he shoots a white man in self-defence, Aboriginal farmhand Sam is forced to flee through the unforgiving outback of 1920s Australia. Gritty western with Sam Neill
53% Steamy thriller starring Matthew McConaughey as a fishing boat captain whose tranquil life is shattered by the arrival of ex-wife Anne Hathaway. Sky Cinema Original Film
62% The Coen brothers' stateside revamp of the classic Ealing comedy sees five bungling bank robbers falling foul of their elderly landlady. Starring Tom Hanks and JK Simmons
Unable to afford the medical bills, desperate dad Denzel Washington holds the emergency room hostage until his young son gets a life-saving operation. Powerful drama
Former US diplomat Jon Hamm is forced to return to the scene of a heartbreaking tragedy in order to negotiate the release of an old friend. Thriller with Rosamund Pike
Action thriller starring Taraji P Henson as a Boston hitwoman who develops a bond with a young boy orphaned by a job gone bad. With Danny Glover
92% Marlon Brando won Best Actor as the ageing Mafia don replaced by steely son Al Pacino. Francis Ford Coppola's towering Mob epic
65% Starry adaptation of Agatha Christie's classic murder mystery novel, with director Kenneth Branagh also playing Belgian sleuth Hercule Poirot
51% A drug lord decides it's time to bow out of the game - but not before one last deal. Unfortunately for him, it looks like it's going to be the toughest one yet
68% Grizzled cop Nick Nolte and wiseass crook Eddie Murphy clash when they're thrown together to catch a killer. Action comedy hit
Nick Nolte's no-nonsense cop reteams with Eddie Murphy's motor-mouthed crook to take down a ruthless San Francisco drug lord
